High volume of requests to non-existent.Action: Analyze Zeek http.log for connections to public-facing web servers resulting in 404 errors (Not Found) or other errors, particularly POST/GET requests for suspicious paths (e.g., admin, .env, backup, common directories). Identify source IPs with an unusually high rate of such requests using statistical analysis (e.g., calculating z-scores or IQR for request volume per source IP).

Numerous requests or attempts to access.Action: Monitor Zeek conn.log for connections to cloud storage endpoints (e.g., s3.amazonaws.com, storage.googleapis.com). Identify source IPs making a large number of requests to these endpoints targeting sequential or dictionary-like object names. Use correlation analysis to link connection attempts to known cloud storage naming conventions or publicly available lists.
